400.title: Bad Request
400.description: The request sent by the client is malformed or invalid.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.description: The client must authenticate itself to get the requested response.

403.title: Forbidden
403.description: The client does not have permission to access the requested resource.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: The requested resource could not be found on the server.

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.description: A generic error message indicating that an unexpected condition was encountered on the server.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.description: The server is not ready to handle the request. Commonly used during maintenance or if the server is overloaded.

unexpected.title: Unexpected Error
unexpected.description: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.
